answers.answer: Maybe you should see your doctor?
Yeah I'd call my doctor or go in asap.
I have seen my doctor today and went to the ER last sunday. She could not tell me why this was happening. She just told me to not stand up to long or do anything but rest.
I just want to know what could be wrong. The baby moves all the time and his heart is strong.

Has she tested you for preeclampsia? Well since the baby is moving around that's good. My blood pressure randomly gets crazy and my heart pounds at random moments even if I'm just sitting down so I had my doctor test me for it. That's weird she doesn't know why though? Definitely stay off your feet as much as possible!
No but I have been bleeding for about a week now. Could it possibly be my placenta is too far down that makes me bleed? I only bleed a small bit. Also my bp os low and high. Not just high.
I am about to have to go back to work. We are in difficult financial times now
Yes you can bleed if your placenta is low against your cervix have they checked to see if that's a possibility? Are you on bed rest due to your bleeding?

Go to the hospital have them check your plasenta dont leave till they have a answer they will tell you they rely on the heart beat and it should be fine but tell them you want it done my last pregnancy went threw the same thing kind of and not a good ending not trying to scare you but you dont bleed for no reason

I have been put on bedrest by my doctors. Because of my bp and that I am still bleeding. I am more spot bleeding. So it not very much at all. The doctor told me that there is not a chance for me to losses the baby sence I am 33-34 weeks now. I am just worried about trying to work again. I have 2 doctors one told me that i can work for 6hrs and the other one told me not to work at all.
What type of work do you do?
I am on my feet all the time. I work at a grosherry store.

question: I am 33 weeks. I have been bleeding/spoting red. Have had contractions like 1 a day and alot of lower adomanal pains. Also my bp goes from low to high within a 10 min window. 97/50 and 145/78... has anyone ever experienced this? It is my first child and I am 31years old.
title: please help me understand
